CustomField.formula: IF(LEN(Tertiary_Sales_Mgr__c) >1,Tertiary_Sales_Mgr__r.FirstName & " " & Tertiary_Sales_Mgr__r.LastName, IF(LEN(Secondary_Sales_Mgr__c)>1 ,Secondary_Sales_Mgr__r.FirstName & " " & Secondary_Sales_Mgr__r.LastName, IF(LEN(Primary_Sales_Mgr__c) >1 ,Primary_Sales_Mgr__r.FirstName & " " & Primary_Sales_Mgr__r.LastName, "Missing Leader")))
CustomField.label: Regional Leader
